scripts.prerelease: pnpm run build && pnpm run format && git diff --exit-code --quiet || { echo 'Error: Uncommitted changes'; exit 1; }
scripts.release:patch: pnpm run prerelease && pnpm version patch && pnpm publish
scripts.release:minor: pnpm run prerelease && pnpm version minor && pnpm publish
scripts.release:major: pnpm run prerelease && pnpm version major && pnpm publish
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && gh release create v$(pnpm list --json | jq -r '.[0].version') --verify-tag --generate-notes
